title: Trump’s “Good Economy Pay Cuts”, Sicko Guac Mode 2.13.20
itunes:title: Trump’s “Good Economy Pay Cuts”, Sicko Guac Mode 2.13.20
description:
In episode 569, Jack and Miles are joined by comedian and co-host of Unofficial Expert podcast Sydnee Washington to discuss Guac Mode, Bernie Sanders' victory in New Hampshire, Bernie versus MSNBC, Trump cutting the federal pay raise, weird and crappy merch from the 2020 Democratic presidential candidates, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Chipotle unleashes “Guac Mode” upon customers nationwide
  2. Ex-Goldman Sachs CEO rips Bernie Sanders: He’ll ruin our economy and doesn’t care about our military
  3. Bernie Sanders Has an MSNBC Problem
  4. Trump Cuts Scheduled Federal Pay Raise, Citing “Serious Economic Conditions” in the Country
  5. Pete Buttigieg’s ‘Invest in Black America’ T-shirt sparks backlash
  6. A stock image was used to promote Pete Buttigieg’s plan for black America. The photo was taken in Kenya.
  7. What the 2020 candidates’ merch says about their campaigns
  8. The Strokes Bring the Bernie Sanders Revolution to New Hampshire
  9. WATCH: Take_it_Back_v2 by Denzel Curry, Kenny Beats 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
